name: Michele Laurelli
bio: AI Architect & Researcher specializing in private AI models and systems, autonomous agents, and AI architectures. Founder of Algoretico. University professor adj and author.

seo.title: Michele Laurelli - AI Expert
seo.description: Expert in private AI systems, autonomous agents, and deep learning architectures. University Professor and Author.

name: Fisnik Murati
bio: I am Fisnik Murati, a 25-year-old software engineer from Kosovo with a bachelor’s degree in Engineering Informatics and more than five years of experience in software development. I started my career building traditional web and backend systems, and over time I shifted my focus toward AI, automation, and building real-world LLM solutions.
